      • setStepPixelInterval

        public void setStepPixelInterval(int stepPixelInterval)
        Sets the stepInPixel. This interval may not be strictly respected: it is used for automatic stepping, it helps the system to calculate the best step. Setting this property means that you want the plotter to use a stepping of, nearly, n pixels.
        Parameters:
        stepPixelInterval - The stepPixelInterval to set
